name: Survive the Hollowing
description:
In the Dark month of October, Fred the Worm must face an unforeseen threat against his home: the Carver. The Carver attacks his Pumpkin home, but you must play as Fred in order to stop the powerful entity from invading his home. Jump, dodge, and shoot to fight against the Hand of the Carver!

Controls

A/D - Move left and right
W/S - Aim up and down
Spacebar - Jump

Credits
